channel.title: Compiler, Please help?
channel.description:
First of all..
Hello everyone im xLove just started, on Moparscape. Ik got an little problem. I cant compile, i download i few Java's. Still i can't compile cuz they say i dont have Java.
This is the text the compiler says: [b] [i]You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. Finished! Druk op een toets om door te gaan.[/i][/b]
[i]Druk op een toets om door te gaan, is dutch. It means: Press an buttom to go on.[/i]
I tried to download other compilers but when i had 5 compilers and all say same thing. I was out of hope. Becus there is no site starting.
Can any one help me, please? :|
Greetz.
[s][u][b]xLove.[/b][/u][/s]

item.title: Compiler, Please help?

@b4k_2_lumby wrote:

http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/widget/jdk6.jsp

When your installing it make sure you save it to program files under java

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler, Please help?
item.dc:creator: @xLove xLove
item.description:
@xLove wrote:

Hi,

Well look this is what i got in my compiler.
And u said exactly the same and i dont got (x86).

@echo off
@TITLE xLove Why this wont work?
if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit
@echo off

So what to do next?
Becus it still does not work.
Can u give me the dlink of the Java u got?

xLove

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler, Please help?
item.dc:creator: @b4k_2_lumby b4k 2 lumby
item.description:
@b4k_2_lumby wrote:

Right click the compiler go to edit and delete all of it and copy n paste this.

@echo off @TITLE Server if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. :end echo Finished! pause exit

If you have java in your program (x86) files then copy n paste this

@echo off @TITLE Server if exist "%programfiles (x86)%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles (x86)%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. :end echo Finished! pause exit

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler, Please help?
item.dc:creator: @xLove xLove
item.description:
@xLove wrote:

First of all…

Hello everyone im xLove just started, on Moparscape.
Ik got an little problem. I cant compile, i download i few Java’s.
Still i can’t compile cuz they say i dont have Java.

This is the text the compiler says:

You do not have Java installed.
Please download it at the site that is about to load.
Finished!
Druk op een toets om door te gaan.

Druk op een toets om door te gaan, is dutch.
It means: Press an buttom to go on.

I tried to download other compilers but when i had 5 compilers and all say same thing.
I was out of hope. Becus there is no site starting.

Can any one help me, please?

Greetz.

xLove.
